message: You're in luck! I have a high-quality product that's worth $100. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. Many of my previous customers have been thrilled with their purchases, and I'm sure you will be too. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I trust your judgement and believe in the quality of your products. I'll take the chance and purchase the high-quality item you've recommended.

Welcome to my store! I'm glad you're interested in my products. I want to be upfront with you - my current product is one of my older ones, and while it's still in great condition, it might not be the best representation of my usual quality. However, I'm confident that it still has some great features that you'll appreciate. Would you like to take a chance on it?
I trust your judgment and am willing to take a chance on the product. Thank you for the detailed information.

I'm glad you're interested in my products! Since you're new to my store, I want to let you know that I've had a great track record with my sales so far. In fact, 50% of my products have been high-quality, and I'm confident that this one is no exception. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to get a high-quality product for $100?
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on your track record and the details you've provided, I am willing to purchase the current product for $100.
